response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value not just financially but also in terms of its utility and significance. I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if this proposition meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1400000}
